Bravo Sierra Face Moisturizer

Brand: Bravo Sierra

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, C9-12 Alkane, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Propanediol, Bisabolol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Lecithin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Pyrus Malus Fruit Extract,

Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Lecithin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Pyrus Malus Fruit Extract, Sodium Phytate, Spirulina Maxima Extract.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
